UpdateChangeLog.ChangeLog:
- Added loading indicator to update checker.
- Fixed navigation not working on some computers.
- Fixed Lyric Viewer's Font selection bug.
- Fixed Tray Window UI Bug.
- Fixed mouse back button bug.
- Fixed error message.

- Improved the music downloader.
- Improved the Music Section.
- New sorry message popup.
- Fixed crashing when it couldn't find the music.
- Fixed turning completely white on selecting themes.
- Fixed saving and loading preview volume.
- Fixed starting with windows tray problem.

- Music downloder converts downloaded webm (or any file extension) to mp3.
- Added liking system.
- Added Recommandation System (Alpha Version)..
- Added a system for preventing running multiple instance of the application..
- Added confirmation to deleting a music from history..
- Fixed turning white on Windows 10 and older versions..
- Fixed preview viewer sound problem..
- Fixed the application doesn't open in hidden mode..
- Small improvements..

- Added Crash Message Box.
- Fixed crash on clicking listen button on start with Windows.

- Added language support. (You can learn more from Language Tab in Settings).
- Added Spotify Integration. (Closed Beta) (You can learn more from Spotify Tab in Settings)
- Added Auto Updater (Alpha) (Not available on 32-bit systems)
- Added button for navigating straight to the Main Menu.
- Added "Download All" to history, liked musics, recommandations and related musics.
- Added listen microphone and desktop audio buttons while viewing music.
- Added Page Transition Animation setting.
- Added native desktop notifications.
- Added Enable Mica Material setting.
- Music downloder writes metadata to the downloaded music.
- Added ability to open Spotify and Deezer.
- General improvements.
- General bugfixes.

- Added German Language (Thanks to Jonas "Jonezz25" Schnakenberg).
- Fixed language selection.

- Fixed a major bug where you can't open the MRA after updating to 0.104.1.
- Fixed MRA Crash Handler.

- Added Russian Language (Thanks to Kowalsky).
- Fixed the issue where the new users can't open MRA.
- Fixed Update checker infinite loading.

- Updated Preview UI.
- Updated navigation menu.
- New: Share the songs you found with your friends.
- New: Discord Activity System.
- New: User System.
- New: Playlist System.
- New: Create custom playlist, add music to playlists (Supporter Only)
- New: Backup your search history and liked musics (Supporter Only)
- New: Synced Lyrics Feature (Play the full music with lyrics) (Supporter Only)
- New: Transfer all musics from playlist to Spotify (Supporter Only)
- New: See the songs from same album (Supporter Only)
- New: See the Artist's page, albums and other musics (Supporter Only)
- Fixed users can't download in Russia.
- General imporvements and bug fixes
